alert.note: Alert for Charles City; New Kent; Prince George; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 09 at 9:52PM EST until January 10 at 2:15AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EST WEDNESDAY FOR CHARLES CITY, CENTRAL NEW KENT, EASTERN PRINCE GEORGE, NORTHWESTERN SURRY AND NORTHEASTERN SUSSEX COUNTIES... At 952 PM EST, Light rain continues across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flooding impacts will continue, but little to no additional rainfall is expected. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... New Kent, Charles City, Waverly, Claremont, Disputanta, Burrowsville, Cabin Point, Garysville, Ruthville, Rustic, Adkins Store, Holdcroft, Providence Forge, Taylors Corner, Oak Hill Corner, Barham, Brandon, Savedge, New Hope and Spring Grove. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; New Kent; Prince George; Surry; Sussex
